title: Babar. Elephant's best friend; The Show must go on
creator_credit: Laura Shepherd, Clive A Smith, Patrick Loubert, Michael Hirsh, Ellipse and Nelvana
brief_description: Join Babar in two more delightful episodes: 1. “An Elephant’s Best Friend” - Lord Rataxes stops all pomegranate shipments from reaching Celesteville, but when Babar calls on the help of a warthog, Rataxes is suddenly willing to talk. 2. “The Show Must Go On” - Babar organises a world-class ballet to be performed in Celesteville, but the star of the show, a temperamental prima ballerina, causes problems for cast and crew. Based on the books by Jean and Laurent de Brunhoff.
